titleStmt.title: Thalia rediviva the pass-times and diversions of a countrey-muse, in choice poems on several occasions : with some learned remains of the eminent Eugenius Philalethes, never made publick till now.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Henry, 1622-1695.
J. W.
Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666. Viri insignissimi et poetarum.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [75]: Eugenii Philalethis Viri insignissimi et poetarum sui sæculi, meritò principis : Vertumnus et Cynthia, &c.
Epistle dedicatory signed: J.W. (never identified Cf. DNB)
"To Mr. Henry Vaughan ... upon these and his former poems": prelim. p. [8]-[9].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
